Name: Early Bird Discount
Description: A discount for early payments within the first 10 days of the billing cycle.

Name: Loyalty Discount
Description: A discount for clients who have been with the company for more than 3 years.

Name: Bulk Payment Discount
Description: Discount offered for making bulk payments for group members.

Name: Holiday Discount
Description: A seasonal discount offered during the holiday period.

Name: Senior Citizen Discount
Description: A discount for clients over 65 years of age.

Name: Referral Discount
Description: A discount given to clients who refer new members.
